ENG: [BOOLEAN] If True skips preprocessed files that are already found
[BOOLEAN] If True previews the changelog before making any changes if False makes changes without preview
Process a night or a set of nights or all nights given some options and a run file
[STRING] The 'filename' to reprocess (default is None for all files)
[STRING] The instrument to reprocess
[STRING] The 'night_name' or directory to reprocess (default is None for all directories)
[STRING] The run file to use in reprocessing
[BOOLEAN] If True does not process any files just prints an output of what recipes would be run
[BOOLEAN] If True activates trigger mode (i.e. will stop processing at the first point we do not find required files). Note one must define --night in trigger mode
[STRING] List of 'night_name's or directories to black list (will not process these directories)
[STRING] List of 'night_name's or directories to white list (will only process these directories)
[INTEGER] Number of cores to use in processing
Remake a database
[STRING] The instrument to remake the database for
[STRING] The kind of database to remake (i.e. calibration or telluric)
Resets the DRS raw/tmp/db/reduced files based on user input
[STRING] The instrument to reset
[BOOLEAN] If True logs the reset else is quite
[BOOLEAN] If True asks for user to type 'YES' before each reset
[BOOLEAN] If True always returns to ipython (or python) at end (via ipdb or pdb)
[STRING] The name of the program to display and use (mostly for logging purpose) log becomes date | {THIS STRING} | Message
Test recipe - used to test the argument parser of the DRS
FR: Test recipe - utilisé pour tester l'analyseur d'arguments du DRS

ENG: This is the top level test recipe

test.py [NIGHT_NAME] [DARK_DARK] [FLAT_FLAT] 
 test.py 2018-08-05 2295520f_pp.fits dark_dark_P5_003d_pp.fits 
 test.py 2018-08-05 2295520f_pp dark_dark_P5_003d_pp.fits 
 test.py 2018-08-05 *f_pp *d_pp
